thread.section_title: TweakBit.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TweakBit.com | tweakbit.com
thread.title: Denis Kimob

author: Denis Kimob
title: Denis Kimob
text: I have been surfing the internet looking for a software that will speed-up my PC and I think this is it. It took me a while to download and run the software but it was worth the wait. Previously, my PC was super slow in opening new windows and painfully slow in running programs. I thought this was as a result of malware but my anti-virus detected none. I started looking for a software to speed-up my PC and this is when I came across PC Optimizer. The price is fair considering that it works as a charm. I highly recommend.
